content: single_crochet single_crochet decrease over the next 2 single_crochet single_crochet decrease over the next 3sc single_crochet decrease over the next 2 single_crochet single_crochet in the next 27 single_crochet 3 single_crochet in the end single_crochet join to first single_crochet chain 1 round 26 single_crochet in the next 25 single_crochet single_crochet decrease over the next 2 single_crochet single_crochet decrease over the next 3sc single_crochet decrease over the next 2 single_crochet single_crochet in the next 25 single_crochet 3 single_crochet in the end single_crochet join to first single_crochet chain 1 round 27 single_crochet in the next 23 single_crochet single_crochet decrease over the next 2 single_crochet single_crochet decrease over the next 3sc single_crochet decrease over the next 2 single_crochet single_crochet in the next 23 single_crochet 3 single_crochet in the end single_crochet join to first single_crochet chain 1 turn the top inside out and slipstitch round 27 stitches together the vulva opening join sport weight yarn in one of the ends of the front loops on round 16 chain 1 *single_crochet in the next 5 front loops half_double_crochet in the next 4 front loops double_crochet in the next 3 front loops treble_crochet in the next 10 loops double_crochet in the next 3 front loops half_double_crochet in the next 4 front loops single_crochet in the next 5 front loops repeat from * once join fasten_off the pubic hair join eyelash yarn and using the us c/3 00 mm hook in one of the ends of the front loops on round 14 chain 1 *single_crochet in the next 5 front loops half_double_crochet in the next 4 front loops double_crochet in the next 3 front loops treble_crochet in the next 10 loops double_crochet in the next 3 front loops half_double_crochet in the next 4 front loops single_crochet in the next 5 front loops repeat from * once join fasten_off joining the pubic hair and the vulva opening join sport weight yarn in one of the ends of the pubic hair single_crochet the hair and vulva together when you get to the end you will form the clitoris and clitoral hood the clitoral hood is formed doing single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet in the back loop of the vulva lips the clitoris is formed using a bobble stitch yarn over hook start the half_double_crochet repeat 3 times until you have 5 loops on stitch yarn over and complete the stitch all in the front loop of the vulva stitch continue with single_crochet the hair and vulva together fasten_off and weave in all ends
